verse:
ईश्वरः परमः कृष्णः सच्चिदानन्द विग्रहः। 
अनादिरादिर्गोविन्दः सर्वकारणकारणम् ॥

words.कृष्णः: A name of Lord Krishna, considered an incarnation of Lord Vishnu
words.सच्चिदानन्द: Existence, Consciousness, Bliss; a term describing the nature of the divine
words.अनादिरादिर्गोविन्दः: The beginningless and endless Govinda, another name for Lord Krishna
words.सर्वकारणकारणम्: The cause of all causes, emphasizing Krishna as the ultimate cause of the universe
